message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to you is $15000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $16000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $16000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $17000. This is a fair price considering its value to you and the effort I've put into acquiring it. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $16500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $16800. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value it holds for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but $16800 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $16200 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $16500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and offer you the product for $16400. This is my final concession. What do you think?
I appreciate your final concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $16500, Bob. I've already made significant concessions and I need to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to make one more offer, but it's my final one. I'll sell the product to you for $16400. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $15800 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you can meet me at this price.
